name: Escape 2...
description:
It's here! Escape 2 is like Escape, but again!!! This project has been fun to make, and in my opinion has turned out pretty decent (even if it takes like 2 minutes to beat). 

This project has been a learning experience. As you can very obviously tell, this game was supposed to be more. A lot more. But at the end of the day, the game is very basic and I lost motivation for the project. 

But don't worry, I have not stopped making games! In fact, the reason I stopped development on this game is because of how passionate I have become for another project. 

So, thank you for checking this out and I hope you enjoy playing!
